H0.text: As at the year 2001, what are the only two films to receive 14 Oscar nominations. Gone with the Wind and Ben-Hur

H1.text: As at the year 2001, what are the only two films to receive 14 Oscar nominations. The Sound of Music and West Side Story

H2.text: As at the year 2001, what are the only two films to receive 14 Oscar nominations. It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World and Around the World in 80 Days

H3.text: As at the year 2001, what are the only two films to receive 14 Oscar nominations. All About Eve and Titanic

A4.text: All About Eve received a record 14 nominations at the 23rd Academy Awards.
